tool_description:
The ZENARK News API provides a reliable data feed of news, press releases and postings from thousands of aggregated Internet sources.

Access real-time and historical news with our easily integrated and robust news API. Our API is based on a RESTful implementation with structured JSON responses. By using the ZENARK API in your application or project you can easily integrate news into your business flow.
name: ZENARK NewsAPI
title: ZENARK NewsAPI

api_list.name: search
